column4: hi, im trying to get ubuntu server to automatically mount my cd/dvdrom at startup with an entry in fstab, just below the entry of my additional hd's that do mount correctly automatically at startup
the entry looks like this: /dev/cdrom1  /mnt/cdrom  udf,iso9660  user,noauto,exec,utf8  0  0
however its not atu mounting the cd/dvd drive  at startup
could mean that does will do "no auto" mount
i can manually mount the drive fine with sudo mount /dev/cdrom1 /mnt/cdrom
from the manpage: noauto do not mount when "maount -a" is given (e.g., at boot time)
just replace the noauto with auto
i see what u saying lets try, thanks fritsch
a cd must be placed in ...
no problem. The man page might is very powerful :-) it is the good side of the force
plz however explain to me what would happen if the box restarts without a cd inserted and fstab loads?
